word_mean: 〔复aortas，aortae〕主动脉：体循环动脉系统的起始主干〔NA〕。起自左心室，先向上升为升主动脉(a.ascendens)，然后弯曲成主动脉弓(arcus aortae)，再下降至胸部成胸主动脉(a.thora-calis)，至腹部成腹主动脉(a.abdominalis)，约在第四腰椎处分成左右髂总动脉(common iliac arte-ries)。见Table of Arteriae

sentence.Network_en: The abdominal aorta is normally smaller than the thoracic aorta.
sentence.Network_cn: 腹主动脉一般比胸主动脉小.

sentence.Network_en: Sudden deceleration may also result in shearing injury to the intima of the aorta.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然减速也可能造成主动脉内膜的剪式裂伤.

sentence.Network_en: The aortic valve is found between the left ventricle and aorta.
sentence.Network_cn: 主动脉瓣位于左心室和主动脉之间.

conclusion In case of esophageal carcinoma with invasion of descending aorta by carcinoma , left heart bypass may increase the probability of the resection and enhance the safety of surgical treatment .结论对部分侵及降主动脉的晚期食管癌患者，应用左心转流技术可增强外科手术的安全性，疗效确切，有一定的推广应用

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Greek aortē (used in the plural by Hippocrates for the branches of the windpipe, and by Aristotle for the great artery), from aeirein 'raise'

entry.def: The aorta is the main artery through which blood leaves your heart before it flows through the rest of your body.

means.word_mean: 1. the large trunk artery that carries blood from the left ventricle of the heart to branch arteries
